DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare two different standard treatment fixation Vancouver B1 periprosthetic . The investigator aim compare open reduction internal fixation use lock plat system versus plat strut allograft cerclage wire determine treatment result faster return function measure TUG test 6 week post-op .
DOC.brief_title: Types Fixation Vancouver B1 Periprosthetic Fractures
DOC.criteria: Age : 18 , upper limit Vancouver type B1 periprosthetic fracture Fracture amenable either treatment group Prosthesis well fixed Provision inform consent Presence active infection around fracture ( soft tissue bone ) Loose prosthesis Trauma patient ISS > 16 associated major injury low extremity Known substance abuse Likely problem , judgment investigator , maintain followup ( i.e. , patient fix address , report plan move town , intellectually challenge patient without adequate family support )
